statements: SELECT * FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT id, username, post FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT post, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT username, likes, comments FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, post FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE comments > 50 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT id, likes, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE likes BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT * FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, post FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE username='john_doe'
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE user_location='New York'
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM social_media_users WHERE user_location LIKE '%ia%'
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date='2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM social_media_users WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_name, followers_count, analysis_date FROM social_media_users JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_users.user_id = sentiment_analysis.user_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users
SELECT user_id, username FROM social_media_users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT username, email FROM social_media_users WHERE username LIKE 'j%'
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, email FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM public.sentiment_data;
SELECT username, email FROM public.user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, reaction_type, timestamp FROM public.post_reaction ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message FROM public.sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM public.sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, message, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM public.user_profile WHERE username LIKE 'joh%' AND email NOT LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, reaction_type, timestamp FROM public.post_reaction WHERE reaction_type IN ('like', 'love') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM public.sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, user_id, message, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_data WHERE message ILIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, post_id, post_content, post_date FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT user_id, count(post_id) AS num_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_posts > 5;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_content, l.like_date FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id JOIN likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id;
